Name: Santiago Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: This Daiquiri is particularly delicate in its balance between sweet and sour.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Santiago Daiquiri contains 156 calories
